Live event

Productsup Customer Connect

Berlin | Thursday, October 19

After hosting a successful event in the heart of NYC to bring together our customers for a day of networking and learning, we’re hosting a second event in Germany’s capital and the home of our HQ.

Join us for the invitation-only event in Berlin on October 19, 2023.

Meet executives from the biggest marketplaces, brands, retailers, and service providers from the DACH, Benelux and Nordics regions. Exchange industry tips and insights with your peers while learning what’s new at Productsup.

This is your opportunity to:

  • Join our CEO Vincent Peters for a conversation about commerce trends and tips, and how they fit into Productsup’s plans for the rest of the year
  • Learn about the latest commerce trends and discover our newest platform capabilities firsthand from our VP Product Strategy, Alexandra Maximova
  • Know how kaiserkraft uses multiple products like Advertising PX and Marketplaces PX to scale across multiple channels globally.
  • Network with your peers across industries in the region and meet with the Productsup team based out of our HQ office

More information to come! Register now to receive all the updates.

Agenda

Time Session Speaker
9 am - 9:30 am Welcome coffee + Registrations
9:30 am - 9:45 am Welcome keynote Vincent Peters, CEO, Productsup
9:45 am - 10:30 am Commerce trends and Productsup platform updates Alexandra Maximova, VP Product Strategy, Productsup
10:30 am - 11:15 am How to scale globally across multiple channels with Productsup Lars Franz, Product Owner, eBusiness (Data Feed), kaiserkraft
11:15 am - 12:00 pm Managed Services by Productsup Katie Moro, Director Managed Service & Regional Manager Solutions Americas & ANZ
12:00 pm - 1:15 pm Lunch
1:15 pm - 2:00 pm Leveraging centralized feeds across global markets with local optimizations Louisa Brauer, Senior SEM Specialist
2:00 pm - 4:00 pm Networking

Please note that the agenda is subject to minor changes. We will keep you informed of these.

Speakers

  • Lars Franz

    Product Owner, eBusiness (Data Feed)
    kaiserkraft

    With over 20 years of experience in ecommerce, Lars Franz currently is the Product Owner of Data Feeds in the eBusiness division at kaiserkraft. He is a champion of the Productsup platform and has extensive knowledge of using the platform for feeds across multiple channels globally.

  • Vincent Peters

    Chief Executive Officer
    Productsup

    Vincent Peters is CEO at Productsup, a Product-to-Consumer software company, where he leads a global team of technologists to help today’s businesses overcome commerce complexity. He’s spent more than 30 years in various sales and leadership roles at fast-growing software companies, like TIBCO, Siebel Systems, Cramer Systems, Intralinks, and Qlik.

  • Alexandra Maximova

    VP Product Strategy
    Productsup

    Sasha Maximova is VP Product Strategy at Productsup where she leads the company’s product management, design & UX, and product evangelist teams. Sasha is responsible for understanding what Productsup’s customers are looking to achieve and building the best possible product to support them in their goals.

  • Louisa Brauer

    Senior SEM Specialist

    Louisa is a senior SEM specialist and supports local and global stakeholders in optimizing the company’s visibility online. Bringing 10 years of experience in search optimization, Brauer helps develop strategic marketing activities across global channels, based on performance analytics and data-driven insights.

  • Katie Moro

    Director Managed Service & Regional Manager Solutions America & ANZ
    Productsup

    Katie Moro is Director of Managed Service & Regional Manager Solutions America & ANZ at Productsup. With over 12 years of experience in digital advertising, Moro started her career on the agency side and eventually transitioned to the client success team at Google where she supported clients throughout the Google Shopping implementation process.
